info.name: XKCD - show transcript
info.description: Did you know that (most) XKCD comics have nice accessible textual transcripts?
info.additionalInfo: Including alt text, which often makes the punch line? If you'd like to have the page "content first", try to Reorder Content. Note: there is currently a bug at XKCD pages: from 1609 strip onward wrong transcripts are displayed.
